Class Instagram.Actions

java.lang.Object
com.xcoder.easyinsta.Instagram.Actions
Enclosing class:
Instagram
public final class Instagram.Actions extends Object
This class includes all common action of your instagram, like following someone,accepting follow request,removing followers etc.
